product_name: Columbia Skiff Guide 3/4-Sleeve Top - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: Headed to sunny, warm climes? The Columbia Skiff Guide 3/4-Sleeve Top in Women's Plus Sizes keeps you dry and comfortable and protects you from harmful UV rays, while looking stylish. Polyester fabric dries quickly and offers UPF 30 sun protection. Omni-Wick(TM) technology pulls moisture away from your skin and helps it evaporate quickly, keeping you dry and comfortable in hot weather. Antimicrobial finish helps reduce odors. Columbia Skiff Guide 3/4-Sleeve Top in Women's Plus Sizes features 3/4-length sleeves.
short_description: Headed to sunny, warm climes? The Columbia Skiff Guide 3/4-Sleeve Top in Women's Plus Sizes keeps you dry and comfortable and protects you from harmful UV rays, while looking stylish.
